newsitem.title: USA: Jersey City, N.J., lists bonds to be refunded.
newsitem.headline: Jersey City, N.J., lists bonds to be refunded.

text.p: (HUDSON COUNTY NEW JERSEY)
GENERAL OBLIGATION REFUNDING BONDS
SERIES 1996A
THE CITY OF JERSEY CITY EXPECTS TO REFUND CITY BONDS
THROUGH ISSUANCE BY THE CITY OF ITS SERIES 1996A GENERAL
IMPROVEMENT, WATER, SCHOOL, AND FISCAL YEAR ADJUSTMENT BONDS
BY PROVIDING FOR THE PAYMENT OF PRINCIPAL OF AND INTEREST AND
REDEMPTION PREMIUM, IF ANY, ON SUCH BONDS.
THE CITY EXPECTS TO REFUND TO ITS EARLIEST RESPECTIVE CALL
DATE THE ENTIRETY OF EACH INDICATED MATURITY OF THE FOLLOWING
OUTSTANDING BONDS:
SERIES 1991A FISCAL YEAR ADJUSTMENT BONDS, TERM BONDS MATURING
SERIES 1988 GENERAL IMPROVEMENT BONDS, SERIAL BONDS MATURING
SERIES 1990 GENERAL IMPROVEMENT BONDS, SERIAL BONDS MATURING
SERIES 1986 SCHOOL BONDS, SERIAL BONDS MATURING 8/1/97-8/1/11
SERIES 1988 SCHOOL BONDS, SERIAL BONDS MATURING
SERIES 1992 SCHOOL BONDS, SERIAL BONDS MATURING
SERIES 1988 WATER BONDS, SERIAL BONDS MATURING
SERIES 1990 WATER BONDS SERIAL BONDS MATURING 1/1/02-1/1/2015
Merrill Lynch & Co.
Fleet Securities
Lehman Brothers
Oppenheimer & Co., Inc.
--U.S. Municipal Desk, 212-859-1650
